posts.raw_content:
This war is a made for hollywood script. From  Zelenskiy doing photoshoots for magazines to Ukraine doing a shoot with fake victims and blood, this war is certainly one of a kind.

During WWII, volunteers made up 39% of our forces and our freedom was never on the line. UK at 5%, Australia even managed 10%.

Yet Ukraine? They sit at 0.27 percent. That's even when remove the population of Crimea and Donbas from the equation.

Absurd.

---------

Moreover, these are the figures of the percentage of GDP spent on the war effort during WWII, where your sovereignty and freedom was actually on the line.



Germany: ~75% (1944)

Japan: ~50% (1944)

USSR: ~61% (1943)

France: ~55% (1940, before defeat)

United Kingdom: ~55% (1944)

United States: ~42% (1944)

Ukraine? 35%

A country we are expected to aid and fight for is not even behaving like their sovereignty depends on it. The USSR was facing total collapse with the Leningrad being besieged for over a year and Nazis a mere 100 miles from Moscow. Ukraine? 

They know doing so will impact Zelenskiyt's base. If you don't keep the lights on in the cafes of Lwow or the clubs in Kiev, then shit will get real. Zelenskiy doesn't even conscript dudes from these regions, only those east of Kiev. Gotta keep a level of comfort for his base so Zelenskiy is not assassinated. 

No more American money and definitely not American lives should ever be wasted on Ukraine.

--------

Asylum seekers.

A staggering 8 million Ukrainians have sought refugee status in another country. 

That number is mind boggling considering the fighting is nowhere close to as fierce as during WWII. 

While there were many displaced, the number of actual refugee seekers is in the millions among all of the countries. 

Ukrainian refugee crisis is one of the largest and fastest-growing refugee movements in modern history. Weird considering many who leave are the ones still encouraging their countrymen from abroad via social media. 


----------
posts.author: p0nchik
posts.title: Eurotrash leaders demanding Americans fight in Ukraine while only 0.27% of Ukraine's population has volunteered - List of oddities
posts.content:
This war is a made for hollywood script. From Zelenskiy doing photoshoots for magazines to Ukraine doing a shoot with fake victims and blood, this war is certainly one of a kind.

During WWII, volunteers made up 39% of our forces and our freedom was never on the line. UK at 5%, Australia even managed 10%.

Yet Ukraine? They sit at 0.27 percent. That's even when remove the population of Crimea and Donbas from the equation.

Absurd.

Moreover, these are the figures of the percentage of GDP spent on the war effort during WWII, where your sovereignty and freedom was actually on the line.

Germany: ~75% (1944)

Japan: ~50% (1944)

USSR: ~61% (1943)

France: ~55% (1940, before defeat)

United Kingdom: ~55% (1944)

United States: ~42% (1944)

Ukraine? 35%

A country we are expected to aid and fight for is not even behaving like their sovereignty depends on it. The USSR was facing total collapse with the Leningrad being besieged for over a year and Nazis a mere 100 miles from Moscow. Ukraine?

They know doing so will impact Zelenskiyt's base. If you don't keep the lights on in the cafes of Lwow or the clubs in Kiev, then shit will get real. Zelenskiy doesn't even conscript dudes from these regions, only those east of Kiev. Gotta keep a level of comfort for his base so Zelenskiy is not assassinated.

No more American money and definitely not American lives should ever be wasted on Ukraine.

Asylum seekers.

A staggering 8 million Ukrainians have sought refugee status in another country.

That number is mind boggling considering the fighting is nowhere close to as fierce as during WWII.

While there were many displaced, the number of actual refugee seekers is in the millions among all of the countries.

Ukrainian refugee crisis is one of the largest and fastest-growing refugee movements in modern history. Weird considering many who leave are the ones still encouraging their countrymen from abroad via social media.
